Embracing sustainable transportation practices is key for reducing carbon footprints. Opting for greener alternatives like walking, biking to campus, carpooling, and using public transportation can significantly reduce emissions.

C Verde is an innovative platform that empower individuals and enterprises to take part in top-tier carbon activities.
Thank you for making the effort to stay green!
You have emitted 120 kg CO2 this week

Start by answering a few questions. 
Your responses will give us a rough estimate of your carbon emissions. 

Remember, there are no right or wrong answers. It’s not about 
perfection but about guiding your next steps for action. 

Ready?

Thank you for your answers! 
Your insights will help us understand your 
impact and guide you in reducing
 your carbon footprint. 

Let’s keep making a difference together!

Masugid Enterprise is a student-led business from Quezon City University (QCU) offering churros with a unique twist—served with creamy matcha. \n\nThis venture combines the popular snack of churros with a rich, smooth matcha flavor, appealing to those who enjoy classic treats with a modern, flavorful upgrade.

Wani Enterprise, run by Quezon City University (QCU) students, offers unique, savory waffles for an affordable 25 pesos each. With flavors like asado and adobo, the business blends Filipino-inspired tastes with the popular waffle format, aiming to provide a satisfying and budget-friendly snack for students and the local community.
“Langka-Tulad, Langka-Pantay at \nLangkasing-Sarap na Jack of Pie”

Playmaker Enterprise is established by a group of students from Quezon City University, pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Entrepreneurship, with a shared vision and determination to make a meaningful impact in the culinary landscape. Drawing upon their academic background and passion for entrepreneurship, the students saw an opportunity to leverage their skills and creativity to create a business that not only generates profits but also makes a positive difference in their community.\n\nWith a focus on serving delicious pies infused with the unique flavors of jackfruit, the students recognized the potential to introduce something innovative and distinctive to the market. Their choice of jackfruit as a main ingredient reflects not only their desire to offer something unexpected and delightful but also their commitment to supporting local agriculture and promoting sustainability.

" C-Verde is an innovative mobile application designed to help individuals monitor and reduce their carbon footprint in an accessible way. By tracking daily activities like transportation, electricity usage, food consumption, and waste generation, 
C-Verde provides users with valuable insights into their environmental impact and encourages sustainable practices. Through its intuitive interface, users can enter data about their routines, and the app calculates their carbon footprint, giving a clear overview of the environmental impact of their actions. With tailored recommendations on how to reduce emissions and adopt eco-friendly habits. C-Verde empowers users to make informed decisions and take actionable steps toward a more sustainable lifestyle. In addition to tracking emissions, C-Verde offers challenges and tasks that motivate users to reduce their carbon footprint. Successful completion of these challenges rewards users with vouchers, encouraging continued engagement and improvement in sustainability efforts. These rewards come from enterprises that align with C-Verde's mission of promoting environmental sustainability.
C-Verde’s ultimate goal is to create a community of QCU students who actively contribute to reducing global carbon emissions. The app is designed to be user-friendly and accessible, making sustainability easy to integrate into everyday life. 
By providing feedback and tailored suggestions, C-Verde helps users adopt greener habits that can have a lasting positive impact on the environment. 
With a focus on privacy, C-Verde ensures that all personal data is securely stored and never shared with third parties without user consent. The app’s features are continually updated to improve functionality and offer even more ways for users to reduce their environmental impact. C-Verde is not just an app; it’s a movement towards a more sustainable future. Whether you’re looking to make a small change or completely overhaul your lifestyle, C-Verde provides the tools and motivation to make a difference.
"

C-Verde collaborates with Masugid, Wani, and Playmaker to promote sustainability through user engagement. Users can earn discounts or vouchers by participating in challenges and when users reach specific carbon emission reduction goals. The potential larger discounts are redeemable green products from the enterprises.
